attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we do not want HIP Inspectors in our homes,this is a gross intrusion into our privacy. Nothing these Inspectors will see could not be seen by prospective buyers. We have always had to produce  fuel bills at a sale anyway so why have to pay £200 now for this privilege They have the potential to earn £80,000 p a  charged at £130 per house call of 45 minutes.Its criminal to advertise this fact when there are people living on the breadline.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
